attributes.action: GET FAMILIES OUT OFF MELLISH COURT
attributes.additional_details: Please help us get out off here none should be made to live like this really isn’t fair
attributes.background: The Place is falling apart the balconies are crumbling everyones balcony door has been locked until Further notice surely that’s a fire risk? You have crack heads injecting in bin cupboards and in the stairs young children live here there so much more going on please sign this to help get us out

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of Milton Keynes Council. You can find out how to contact the council here:

https://www.milton-keynes.gov.uk/your-council-and-elections/contact-us

You could raise the issue with local councillors who represent you. You can find out who your councillors are, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
